Title: Object: Essai au crayon à la plume et à l'estompe
Description: The Holy Family in Egypt; exercise in lithographic pen, crayon and stump. 15 November 1809 Lithograph in brownish ink, on stiff cream wove paper
Producer name: Print made by: Baron Dominique Vivant Denon
Curator's comments: Also see cat. exhib. 'Denon, l'oeil de Napoléon', Paris, 1999, No.69.
Bibliographic references: Chu 1988 / Dominique Vivant Denon. French master of the nineteenth century (459)
Winkler 1975 / Die Frühzeit der deutschen Lithographie (151.1)
